law.text: Upon the written application of the insured, stating his or her reasons therefor, filed with and approved by the commissioner, a rate in excess of that provided by a filing otherwise applicable may be used on any specific risk.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1126, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 187, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 138, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 13, sec. 10, effective June 18, 1970.
